backend/main.mo: Main actor defining hotel management system with types for hotels, users, daily reports, emergencies, tasks, and audit logs; includes authentication via MixinAuthorization, default hotel initialization, and various CRUD operations with role-based access control.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module defining ActorV1 and ActorV2 schemas with a run function that migrates users map from Principal-keyed to Text-keyed (using principal.toText()) and adds nextUserId field.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting two high-confidence features: removing principal ID input from CreateUserDialog form and updating useCreateUser hook to handle principal ID server-side.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of frontend files including routing, authentication, React Query hooks for backend operations, UI components for admin and hotel user workflows, and styling with OKLCH color system.
frontend/index.css: Global CSS with Tailwind layers defining OKLCH-based color variables for light and dark themes, including warm hospitality-focused palette and sidebar styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with root div and module script loading main.tsx for the Cluster LPM application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application setup with TanStack Router configuration, QueryClient provider, route definitions for admin and hotel user pages, and RequireAuth wrapper for role-based access control.
frontend/src/components/admin/CreateHote: Dialog component for creating new hotels with form validation, loading states, and integration with useCreateHotel mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/admin/CreateTask: Dialog component for creating tasks with form validation, hotel selection via checkboxes, and submission that converts dates to nanosecond timestamps and assigns tasks to multiple hotels.
frontend/src/components/admin/CreateUser: Dialog component for creating new users with form validation, hotel assignment, role selection (admin/user), and password requirements (minimum 8 characters).
frontend/src/components/admin/DeleteHote: Alert dialog component for confirming hotel deletion with a warning that hotels with assigned users cannot be deleted.
frontend/src/components/admin/DeleteUser: Alert dialog component for confirming user deletion with loading state during the deletion process.
frontend/src/components/admin/EditHotelD: Dialog component for editing hotel properties including name and active status, with form pre-population from existing hotel data.
frontend/src/components/admin/EditUserDi: Dialog component for editing user details including name, username, hotel assignment, role, active status, and password with validation and form pre-population.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Authentication wrapper component that verifies user identity, checks admin/user roles, handles loading states, and displays error screens for deactivated accounts or authentication failures.
Main application shell component providing navigation header, sidebar with role-based menu items (admin vs hotel), user profile dropdown, and footer with social links.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that manages the backend actor instance with authentication, initializes access control with admin token, and invalidates dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout flow, identity persistence, and authentication status with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom OKLCH color palette for warm hospitality theme, dark mode support, and utility classes for dialogs and interactive elements.
frontend/src/lib/auth/useAuth.ts: Authentication hooks for fetching and saving user profiles, checking admin status, with React Query integration for caching and error handling.
frontend/src/lib/backend/admin.ts: React Query hooks for admin hotel management operations: fetching all hotels, creating, updating, and deleting hotels with toast notifications.
frontend/src/lib/backend/analytics.ts: Placeholder hook for analytics summary queries, currently disabled as backend implementation is not yet available.
frontend/src/lib/backend/audit.ts: React Query hook for fetching audit logs from the backend actor.
frontend/src/lib/backend/emergencies.ts: Placeholder hooks for emergency management (submit, fetch, recipient management), all disabled as backend implementation is not yet available.
frontend/src/lib/backend/hotels.ts: React Query hook for fetching all hotels from the backend actor.
frontend/src/lib/backend/queries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching the current user's role and profile from the backend actor, with proper loading and error states.
frontend/src/lib/backend/reports.ts: Contains placeholder React Query hooks for daily report functionality (get my reports, get all reports, save report) that are currently disabled as the backend implementation is not yet available.
frontend/src/lib/backend/tasks.ts: Provides React Query hooks for task management including fetching user/all tasks, creating tasks, and managing task comments with toast notifications.
frontend/src/lib/backend/users.ts: Implements React Query hooks for user management including fetching all user profiles and creating new users with detailed error handling and logging for authorization and validation errors.
frontend/src/lib/export/csv.ts: Utility function that exports an array of objects to a CSV file with proper escaping and downloads it to the user's browser.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminAnalyticsP: Analytics dashboard page displaying placeholder metrics cards for reports, emergencies, and tasks with a notice that backend functionality is not yet implemented.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminAuditLogsP: Displays a filterable table of system audit logs with action type and hotel filters. Shows timestamp, principal, action, hotel, and details for each log entry.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Main administrator dashboard with quick action cards linking to analytics, reports, emergency log, tasks, hotels, users, emergency recipients, and audit logs sections.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminEmergencyL: Displays all emergency alerts across hotels in a filterable table showing date, hotel, severity, room, description, and reported by information.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminEmergencyR: Manages SMS notification contacts for emergency alerts with add/remove functionality and a table displaying current recipients.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminHotelsPage: Manages hotel properties with a table view and dialogs for creating, editing, and deleting hotels. Shows hotel ID, name, and active status.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminReportsDas: Displays daily operational reports in a filterable table with CSV export functionality. Includes alert noting backend implementation is pending.
Admin page for viewing all tasks across hotels with a table displaying task details (title, priority, status, due date, assigned hotels/users) and a button to create new tasks via CreateTaskDialog.
Admin page for managing user accounts, displaying a table of all users with their profiles (name, username, role, hotel, contact, status) and actions to create, edit, or delete users through respective dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/hotel/DailyReportForm: Hotel user page with a form to submit daily operational reports including numeric fields for occupancy, VIP arrivals, incidents, complaints, and injuries; validates hotel assignment and navigates to reports list on success.
frontend/src/pages/hotel/EmergencyTrigge: Hotel user page for submitting emergency alerts with category selection, severity level, and details; triggers immediate notifications and validates hotel assignment before submission.
frontend/src/pages/hotel/HotelDashboardP: Main dashboard for hotel users displaying quick action cards to navigate to daily reports, view submitted reports, trigger emergency alerts, and manage assigned tasks.
frontend/src/pages/hotel/MyDailyReportsP: Hotel user page displaying a table of all daily reports submitted by the current user, showing operational metrics (occupancy, VIP arrivals, incidents, complaints, injuries) with timestamps and badge highlighting for non-zero incident counts.
frontend/src/pages/hotel/MyTasksPage.tsx: React component that displays a user's assigned tasks in a table format with status badges, priority levels, and due dates, fetching data via useGetMyTasks hook.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Login page component that handles Internet Identity authentication with timeout handling, loading stages, and automatic redirection to admin dashboard upon successful authentication.
frontend/src/pages/ProfileSetupPage.tsx: Profile setup page that allows authenticated users to create their profile by entering name and username, with error handling for authorization issues.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, storing, and managing URL parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color schemes (using CSS variables), typography, animations, shadows, and container settings for the frontend application.
project_state.json: Project state tracking document indicating an in-progress fix to remove the principal ID input field from user creation forms and automate principal ID generation server-side.
